text: jaha unhe koyi qabar aman ki ya khauf ki mili unhone ose mashoor karna shuro kar diya halaan ke agar ye log ise rasool(sallallahualaihiwasallam)ke aur apne mein se aisi baatho ki teh tak pahonchne waalo ke hawaale kar dete to us ki haqiqath wo log maalom kar lete, jo natija aqz14 karte hai aur agar Allah taâ€™ala ka fazl aur us ki rehmath tum par na hoti to maadood-e-chandh15 ke ilawa tum sub shaitaan ke pairokaar ban jaate
